content:
@all - task GF#15095 asks for all editors to review the definitions of all identifiers on resources to make sure that the definitions are clear in regards to the use of identifiers. The workflow pattern identifier definitions have been updated to serve as a template. Note this comment from the task:

"Will ask all editors to review their descriptive information for identifier and leverage the above content in their definitions, though they may further refine and give additional domain-specific guidance as appropriate."
I understand that this review probably won't happen today - I will check with FMG that revisions for this purpose will be possible at the end of QA as a QA issue

I am really not clear what the action item is for me... Plus, Provenance and AuditEvent have dualing Identifier + Reference which I think is now redundant... but then these resources are not critical to success of the ballots... right?
